Nightshift tries to chuckle but finds it painful.  He puts a hand over his =
mid section where most of the damage had been done.

" Ow, that wasn't too =
smart.  Well in any event, Wolfgang, you're lucky ya never had wheels.  Yea=
h they can get ya from point A ta point B in a relatively short time but, t=
hey can also get ya in a heap of trouble if ya don't pay attention ta what =
you're do'n.  Look at me now, if I just paid a little more attention ta wha=
t was ahead, I wouldnt've gotten myself totaled.  Oh yeah, I sure hope that=
 when the future comes, that vehicles are driven respectfully.  Because if =
my mistake did this ta me, imagine what it might've done ta the driver insi=
de if I had one in me."

He takes a deep breath, and braces for landing.

"=
 I'm just glad no one was in me, I dunno if I could stand liv'n with the fa=
ct that I could've killed someone, because of my mistake."

Perpetually on =
the move and constantly busy. 

On Sep 26, 2011, at 12:22 PM, Super Cyclonu=
s <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> > <OLD>
> >
> > Nightshift lays back =
with a relaxed expression on his face. It was clear
> > that he was in a tr=
anquil mood.
> >
> > " Sure, it's all good, Wolfgang, I'm just chill'n righ=
t now, just tell'n
> > some stories ta pass the time. Ya know, bots like Tu=
cson and I aren't
> > usually associated as bots with swagger. Nope not us =
but we showed the hot
> > rods a thing or two when we went cubb'n at the Bl=
ue Diode. Ohh yeah we were
> > all over the swagger thing. And even now, he=
ck, we still got it. Well as
> > soon as I get a make over I will. Can't wa=
it ta slip inta some cat like
> > reflexes, and be'n able ta land on my fee=
t a hundred percent of the time.
> > Oh yeah, nine lives would be good too.=
 Can't have too many these days."
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> "Yeah yeah." WOLFGANG sai=
d flippantly. "You think a cat is good, my
> canine speed is awesome." he s=
aid as he lounged back in his chair,
> "You'll see."
> 
> RAMULUS just smil=
ed, "Look you two. Wait till we get back to the Ark
> before you start tryi=
ng to prove who is the best?"
> 
> Ahead of the shuttle the ARK was slowly =
getting larger an larger as
> the shuttle approached.
> 
> "Touchdown in 5 =
cycles (minutes)." POLAR CLAW announced from the front.
> 
> PROWL chimed i=
n, "Landing gear ready."
> 
> The shuttle began its desent out of the air, =
moving quickly towards the ARK.
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston
>

bsp;Well in any event, Wolfgang, you're lucky ya never had wheels.  Ye=
ah they can get ya from point A ta point B in a relatively short time but, =
they can also get ya in a heap of trouble if ya don't pay attention ta what=
 you're do'n.  Look at me now, if I just paid a little more attention =
ta what was ahead, I wouldnt've gotten myself totaled.  Oh yeah, I sur=
e hope that when the future comes, that vehicles are driven respectfully. &=
nbsp;Because if my mistake did this ta me, imagine what it might've done ta=
 the driver inside if I had one in me."</div><div><br></div><div>He takes a=
 deep breath, and braces for landing.</div><div><br></div><div>" I'm just g=
lad no one was in me, I dunno if I could stand liv'n with the fact that I c=

      <p>> <OLD><br>
><br>
> Nightshi=
ft lays back with a relaxed expression on his face. It was clear<br>
> t=
hat he was in a tranquil mood.<br>
><br>
> " Sure, it's all good, Wol=
fgang, I'm just chill'n right now, just tell'n<br>
> some stories ta pas=
s the time.  Ya know, bots like Tucson and I aren't<br>
> usually associ=
ated as bots with swagger.  Nope not us but we showed the hot<br>
> rods=
 a thing or two when we went cubb'n at the Blue Diode.  Ohh yeah we were<br=
>
> all over the swagger thing.   And even now, heck, we still got it.  =
Well as<br>
> soon as I get a make over I will.  Can't wait ta slip inta=
 some cat like<br>
> reflexes, and be'n able ta land on my feet a hundre=
d percent of the time.<br>
> Oh yeah, nine lives would be good too.  Can=
't have too many these days."<br>
<br>
<NEW><br>
<br>
"Yeah yeah." WO=
LFGANG said flippantly. "You think a cat is good, my<br>
canine speed is aw=
esome." he said as he lounged back in his chair,<br>
"You'll see."<br>
<br>=

RAMULUS just smiled, "Look you two. Wait till we get back to the Ark<br>
b=
efore you start trying to prove who is the best?"<br>
<br>
Ahead of the shu=
ttle the ARK was slowly getting larger an larger as<br>
the shuttle approac=
hed.<br>
<br>
"Touchdown in 5 cycles (minutes)." POLAR CLAW announced from =
the front.<br>
<br>
PROWL chimed in, "Landing gear ready."<br>
<br>
The shu=
ttle began its desent out of the air, moving quickly towards the ARK.<br>
